threat_descriptions.Suspicious Path: Process is running from a location commonly used by malware to hide.
threat_descriptions.High-Risk Process: This process type is frequently abused for malicious purposes like command execution, script running, or living-off-the-land attacks.
threat_descriptions.Suspicious Connection: Network connection to a known malicious or suspicious IP address.
threat_descriptions.Suspicious Port: Communication over a port commonly associated with malware, backdoors, or insecure protocols.
threat_descriptions.High CPU Usage: Abnormally high CPU consumption may indicate cryptomining or resource abuse.
threat_descriptions.High Memory Usage: Excessive memory usage may indicate memory-resident malware or resource abuse.
threat_descriptions.VT Malware Detection: VirusTotal has flagged this file as malicious by multiple security vendors.
threat_descriptions.VT Flagged IP: VirusTotal has flagged this IP address as associated with malicious activity.
